title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure of the distributed system, including how data will flow between components and how meteorological models will be implemented.

title: Develop Data Acquisition Module
description: Create a module to collect data from weather stations and satellites in real-time. This module should be able to handle various data formats, ensure data integrity, implement error handling mechanisms, and include mechanisms for data compression to minimize bandwidth usage. The module should also have the ability to validate and filter incoming data before processing.

title: Implement Meteorological Models
description: Code the complex meteorological models that will be used for weather prediction. This task includes implementation of numerical weather prediction (NWP) models such as NAM, GFS, and others. Additionally, consider implementing data processing pipelines for efficient model execution.

title: Create Real-Time Prediction Algorithm
description: Develop an efficient and accurate algorithm to process the acquired data in real-time for weather prediction. The algorithm should leverage the power of machine learning techniques where applicable.

title: Design User Interface for RealTimeWeatherPredictionCluster
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly interface for visualizing weather data and predictions. The design should cater to the needs of meteorologists, climatologists, and general public, providing clear, concise, and interactive representations of data that facilitate understanding, analysis, and decision making.

title: Set Up Database and Data Storage for RealTimeWeatherPredictionCluster
description: Configure a scalable NoSQL database (e.g., MongoDB, Cassandra) to store the acquired weather data, predictions, and meteorological model parameters. Consider performance, redundancy, geographic distribution for efficient data access and sharding strategies for handling massive datasets. Ensure compliance with privacy regulations for sensitive weather data.

title: Implement DevOps for Deployment and Scaling
description: Create CI/CD pipelines, configure the system to scale based on demand, and implement monitoring mechanisms for resource utilization.

title: Conduct Quality Assurance Testing
description: Perform thorough testing of the system to ensure it functions correctly and can handle real-time data.
dependencies: Set Up Database and Data Storage
Implement DevOps for Deployment and Scaling

title: Secure System Against Potential Threats
description: Conduct a comprehensive security assessment of the RealTimeWeatherPredictionCluster and implement necessary security measures to safeguard against potential threats or vulnerabilities.

title: Document System Design and Functionality
description: Write clear, comprehensive documentation detailing the system design, functionality, and usage. Include sections on architecture, components, interfaces, workflow, APIs, data flow, and provide examples and best practices for usage. The documentation should also include a detailed explanation of each component's role in the system and their interactions, as well as a clear description of the expected behavior and edge cases.
